name: places/ChIJY7Tdu5PzwokRQbrB3N55I4o
adrFormatAddress: 110 W 228th St, Bronx, NY 10463, USA

originalText.text:
In my most recent appointment for building gel at Le Chalan, the service I received was below what would be acceptable for any business. I received multiple cuts, uneven filed nail length, bumpy building gel, unpainted edges, and a messy finish. The paint job was horrible. My one-year-old niece could have probably done a better job.

At the end of my service, I spoke to Ely (The Business owner) regarding my dissatisfaction with the service. Instead of taking the feedback and privately addressing her employee, she decided to use me to confront her employee and use the excuse that if the customer weren't giving her direct feedback, they wouldn't believe it, so she says.

This encounter was highly uncomfortable and unprofessional. I will never come back or recommend anyone to visit this place. I walked away, disgusted with the place. Ely needs more training in how to lead a team and run a business. She has trust issues with her team and doesn’t know the value of customer service. The place is gorgeous, but the customer service is poor. No business owner should use their clients to reprimand their employees.

originalText.text: Best place for eyebrows and Self-Care. Le chalan is the best place in the Bronx. With a lot of years of experience.

text.text: Best place for eyebrows and Self-Care. Le chalan is the best place in the Bronx. With a lot of years of experience.

originalText.text: I recently had an amazing experience with the eyebrow microblading service! The skilled technician understood my preferences perfectly and delivered natural-looking, beautifully shaped brows. The process was painless, and the results exceeded my expectations. I'm thrilled with my new eyebrows and would highly recommend this service to anyone looking for precision and professionalism. Elys thank you

I'm thrilled with my new eyebrows and would highly recommend this service to anyone looking for precision and professionalism. Elys thank you

originalText.text: Always and amazing experience at Le Chalan Nail Spa. Staff is very pleasant and the service provided is outstanding.   Ely is always trying to give her clients best products in the market been her client for over 8 years.  If you want to pampered yourself or someone you love place is highly recommended.

text.text: Always and amazing experience at Le Chalan Nail Spa. Staff is very pleasant and the service provided is outstanding.   Ely is always trying to give her clients best products in the market been her client for over 8 years.  If you want to pampered yourself or someone you love place is highly recommended.

originalText.text: My significant other and I went in for a couple's mani-pedi. The interior design was lovely, but I couldn't say the same for the nail service. First off, there was a language barrier between that nail tech and I, so my partner had to translate everything I said. It was an absolute turn-off for me. Although my S.O.'s nail tech was bilingual. There should be more bilingual employees. Secondly, my nail tech did a horrible job with the nail filing! My left thumb, middle, and both ring fingers were very crooked. Unfortunately, I didn't notice this until after I left the establishment and had to fix them myself. She was also conversating on the phone part of the way through my nail experience. I wouldn't have minded it if I knew she was doing my nails properly. Aside from that, the owner was very nice and attentive to my needs.
